metadata.description: The official adaptation of TRANSFORMERS: REVENGE OF THE FALLEN is here! The Transformers' brutal war continues as the noble AUTOBOTS work with their human allies to end the threat of the treacherous DECEPTICONS. But the return of an ultimate evil may prove too much for our heroes. Witness the TRANSFORMERS' perilous battle for survival!
metadata.name: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen Movie Adaptation
